RelatedSentence: Chinese manufacturer ZTE signed a protocol with several Portuguese partners for setting up a centre for research , development and innovation in Braga , reports Jornal de Negocios .
Chinese manufacturer ZTE signed a protocol with several Portuguese partners for setting up a centre for research , development and innovation in Braga , reports Jornal de Negocios .

The cooperation agreement involving the University of Minho , the DST group and InvestBraga ( which manages Startup Braga ) was signed in China , during the official visit of the President of Portugal .

A0: a centre for research , development and innovation
RelatedSentence: The centre will develop and test new services and applications in the field of telecommunications .
